...is sufficient to clone this site... :D 

I'm new here...but if i want to clone an entire zerotalk forum and moderate it myself how can i do?

1571174452_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body: In my opinion the most interesting comparison is between the Joker in The dark Knight (2008) and that in the actual movie (2019)... is interesting how the "enemy" changed over time. In the first film Joker is a sadic guy without any objective apart bring pain and death to Gotham City. In my opinion the two versions of Joker reflect how USA see his enemies in 2008 (terrorist that attacked the Twin Towers "without a reason" apart religion) and in 2019 (Paris and other Europe and USA terrorist attacks caused by muslims that lived in degradated suburbs)

1571938147_17AMQVbBa12XB3xFWKDnP2dCEx92T.body:
i'm a newbie here...but agreealmost to all your points. except:

-PHP is a server-based language...it cannot be used on zeronet
-even if all main zites was created by the creator of zeronet it can be cloned empty and re-cloned in theory if the original ones will be corrupted...right?

> [anonymouslogin](#comment_62_17AMQVbBa12XB3xFWKDnP2dCEx92TaiY7X): "-PHP is a server-based language...it cannot be used on zeronet" [...]

I know that PHP working by creating HTML/CSS/javascript pages to respond to commmand obtained by PC clients....is a client-server language and must work on a server. how can it work on zeronet?

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PHP
